meanings.definition: Any of the different forms of an enzyme that catalyze the same reaction but are different in amino acid sequence.
meanings.sent1: An isozyme is like a twin enzyme, working the same but looking different.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the isozyme to understand how it functions in the body.
meanings.sent3: The isozyme walked into the enzyme party wearing a different amino acid outfit.
meanings.sent4: The isozyme danced to the same tune as the enzyme but with a unique amino acid rhythm.
meanings.sent5: In the lab, the isozyme stood out like a colorful enzyme variant.
